title: Unranked. Looking for people to play with casually for fun.
body:
At first i really enjoyed LoL but after a certain point i couldnt get a game without flamers, leavers or a smurf that just destroys me in lane. this took alot of fun out of the game for me. Im a pretty low level and a very average player.

Trying to find some fun, chill people to play LoL with to bring some fun back into the game for me. Nothing serious just for some fun, any level and any lane. As long as your not toxic.

Add me and msg if you want to play a game.

replies.body:
I'm ranked on my main account on NA, but i'm currently leveling my account on OCE (this account).
Level 27 now, nice to play some chilled games :)
I'd be happy to play with you! Although I am ranked, I am still a pretty average player, and mainly play for the fun of it. It'll be fun to play with someone who plays for the same purpose as me. (:
